default.text: Welcome to the Kohlenstadt Fossil Museum!
default.speaker: Prof. Budde

default.text: I'm Professor Budde, the leading fossil researcher in the Ruhr region!
default.speaker: Prof. Budde

default.text: Did you know that many monster fossils were found in our coal mines?
default.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Ach, you must be the young trainer from down the street!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Your mother told me you're planning to go on an adventure!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: You'll need a monster partner for that journey, wat?
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Come! I have three specially revived fossil monsters for you to choose from!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Speak to me again when you're ready to choose your partner!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Take good care of your monster partner!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: Remember, the bond between trainer and monster is sacred!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde

pages.text: If you find any rare fossils, bring them to me!
pages.speaker: Prof. Budde
